summary: Candidate extractor for Stage B LLM refinement.

top_level_symbols.name: LLMCandidateConfig
top_level_symbols.doc:
Configuration for selecting spans that require LLM refinement. Attributes:
    conf_threshold: Confidence above which spans are skipped.

top_level_symbols.name: LLMCandidatePreparer
top_level_symbols.doc:
Collect spans that need LLM help (Unknown or low-confidence). Attributes:
    cfg: Selection policy for candidate spans.
